mapper.insert: insert into sf_shop_sku (id, create_time, shop_id, shop_user_id, spu_id, sku_id, is_sale, agent_level_id, bail, ship_amount, sale_num, share_num, qr_code, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shopUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shareNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sf_shop_sku set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shop_user_id = #{shopUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spu_id = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_sale = #{isSale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agent_level_id = #{agentLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bail = #{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ship_amount = #{shipAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_num = #{saleNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, share_num = #{shareNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, shop_id, shop_user_id, spu_id, sku_id, is_sale, agent_level_id, bail, ship_amount, sale_num, share_num, qr_code, remark from sf_shop_sku where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_time, shop_id, shop_user_id, spu_id, sku_id, is_sale, agent_level_id, bail, ship_amount, sale_num, share_num, qr_code, remark from sf_shop_sku

select id, create_time, shop_id, shop_user_id, spu_id, sku_id, is_sale, agent_level_id, bail, sale_num, share_num, qr_code, remark from sf_shop_sku where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
